entry.title: Sugar
entry.summary:
Author: Changbinsthang

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 56,746Chapters: 14/15Kudos: 220

Summary: Twenty-eight thousand, six hundred seventy-six dollars and forty-nine cents. That’s how much debt he was in after his tuition balance finally posted. Felix stared at the number, numb. His adrenaline had spiked so fast that now his hands tingled, his stomach twisted hollow, and a cold sweat clung to the back of his neck. He was officially at rock bottom—with absolutely no idea how to climb out. Tears pricked behind his eyes, hot and humiliating. Felix swallowed. And then it came back—that thought. That dangerous, glowing idea that had been flickering in the back of his mind every time he looked at his boss. He’d spent the last week and a half pushing it down. Forcing it down. Trying to bury it beneath professionalism and pride. But what was wrong with…asking? Not that word. Not outright. Just an offer. A proposal. The worst he could do was say no. --- Felix is technically Chris' sugar baby but it's never outright said.

entry.title: Love, With Consequences
entry.summary:
Author: polahusband

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,053Chapters: 4/100Kudos: 13

Summary: In the Stray Kids dorm, love isn’t simple—it’s messy, intense, and sometimes… dangerously playful. Lee Know and Han Jisung have been together for years, navigating a relationship built on trust, desire, and the occasional lesson in consequence. Their quiet, intimate battles of control and surrender are a language all their own—where punishment is never cruelty, but care. Across the dorm, desire simmers in secret. Bang Chan, Hyunjin, and Felix pine for each other in ways that no one dares to voice, while Seungmin and Changbin explore a friendship with boundaries that blur in the dark. Even the youngest, I.N, walks a solitary path, quietly observing the heat, longing, and chaos around him. This is a story of longing and possession, of trust and temptation, of hearts tangled in years of affection, lust, and complicated devotion. In this dorm, love comes with consequences—and sometimes, the sweetest consequences are the ones you never see coming.

entry.title: a hauntingly hot christmas (ho ho horror!)
entry.summary:
Author: purplyknow

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,528Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 206

Summary: “Please. Can we… can we just have sex?” The question hung in the air; insane and just absolutely incredulous. Minho, the demon feared by even his own kind, could do nothing but just stare. His bloodshot eyes wide with what looked like a mixture of disbelief, incredulity and rage. He didn't answer, couldn't answer. Hell he had no answer. He had nothing to pull out, had no frame of reference for any of this. Chan didn’t wait for one. He couldn't. The last thread of his sanity had snapped, officially. He needed to feel something other than this soul-crushing emptiness. He needed a distraction, a violent, consuming act to blot out the memory of his girlfriend’s betrayal. He stepped back, his hands fumbling with the hem of his shirt, and in one fluid motion, stripped it off. (Or; It's Christmas eve and Chan had caught his girlfriend cheating on him. Pushed past his breaking point, he does the unthinkable and pulls the terrifying ghost/demon that has long tormented him for a kiss. He somehow doesn't get torn apart, and istead, he gets a reaction. Chan, miserable, desperate to forget and just longing for any kind of connection, decides to take things a step further.)

entry.title: Access All Areas

Author: excusemehotchocolate

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 27,568Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 169

Summary: Felix perks up when a sudden idea strikes him. “You know what would be hilarious? If we pretend to be in a relationship.” “Huh?” “Think about it. People want to see us fuck but wouldn’t it add to the allure if our viewers think we’re dating? It would really sell the image.” Felix reasons and Chan hums, contemplating his suggestion. “You know what? I think you might be onto something.” Chan agrees. “We’re adding more to what the viewers want.” “Exactly! Us having sex will rack in the money but the idea of us being together will give us even more. So what do you say? Want to pretend to be my boyfriend on camera?”Camboys Chan and Felix decide to link up and pretend to date to make more money from streaming. Lines quickly get crossed and the plan easily goes south.
